title: Miracle in The Andes by Nando Parrado (Perseu)
description:
Nando Parrado was unconscious for three days before he woke to discover
that the plane carrying his rugby team, as well as their family members
and supporters, to an exhibition game in Chile had crashed somewhere
deep in the Andes. He soon learned that many were dead or dyingÃ¢â‚¬â€among
them his own mother and sister. Those who remained were stranded on a
lifeless glacier at nearly 12,000 feet above sea level, with no supplies
and no means of summoning help. They struggled to endure freezing
temperatures, deadly avalanches, and then the devastating news that
the search for them had been called off.

Miracle in The Andes
By: Nando Parrado
